message.body: I don't feel good. I'm gonna go to the funeral with you tomorrow but I don't know if I'm gonna go to the viewing tonight. I have a headache and am in a pretty bad mood.

Yeah. I don't want to not go to either one. I want to be there for you. I just don't know if I can do it for three hours tonight. My head feels like it's going to explode and I'm close to tears. Just a bad day.

And tomorrow I need to seriously sit down and start the process for my NJ license so that I can have it as a safeguard in the future. This place is just so awful. This is a freak out day for me. I'm sorry.
It just makes me so mad that I have to do every one else's job here.
I'm sorry you feel so bad. And I guess the sunburn isn't helping.
You don't have to come tomorrow either
Actually that's the least of my complaints right now. But my chest is pretty itchy. It's hard to not scratch it. I will come with you. I already put in for the day.
I'd prefer to go to the funeral.
I'm sure that's just what you'd like to have on your phone. Haha.
